name: Diamond Sword
description: A shining sword made from pure diamond, known for its incredible sharpness and durability.
looks: The Diamond Sword has a slender, curved blade with a razor-sharp edge. The hilt is made of polished silver and is adorned with intricate engravings. The blade glimmers with a bright blue hue, reflecting light in all directions.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.sharpness: Increases chance to deal critical damage.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron.
looks: The iron sword has a simple but effective design. The blade is straight and double-edged, with a slightly curved crossguard and a leather-wrapped hilt.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of sturdy gauntlets made of steel.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of polished steel plates, with a reinforced palm and finger sections. They have adjustable leather straps for a secure fit.

name: Battle Axe
description: A large and heavy axe used for melee combat.
looks: The battle axe has a long wooden handle with a large metal blade on one end. The blade has a sharp edge and a curved shape, making it ideal for slashing and chopping.

special_weapon_skills.axe_mastery: Grants a bonus to Axe Mastery skill when wielded.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A small dagger made of silver, designed for quick and precise attacks.
looks: The silver dagger has a slim and elegant design, with a sharp blade and a hilt adorned with intricate engravings. It glimmers in the light, reflecting the surroundings.

name: Staff of the Arcanist
description: A powerful staff imbued with arcane energy, capable of enhancing spellcasting abilities.
looks: The Staff of the Arcanist is a tall and slender staff made of polished oak. It is adorned with intricate carvings and has a glowing crystal at the top.

special_weapon_skills.arcane_magic: Increases the power of arcane spells.

special_effects.mana_regeneration: Regenerates mana over time while equipped.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy and durable armor made from steel plates
looks: The armor is made up of interlocking steel plates, covering the entire torso and extending down to the knees. It has thick shoulder and elbow guards.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword that is ideal for close combat.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is made of leather and has a crossguard for hand protection. The pommel is rounded and provides balance to the sword.

name: Steel Dagger
description: A small and sharp dagger made of steel.
looks: The steel dagger has a sleek and slim design, with a double-edged blade and a hilt made of polished wood. It is small enough to be concealed easily.

special_weapon_skils.dagger: Grants a bonus to Dagger skill when equipped.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the power to cast a fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment with intricate symbols and runes written in red ink. It emits a faint heat and has a faint fiery glow.

special_effects.cast_speed: Reduces the casting time of fire spells by 20% when equipped.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the elemental forces of nature.
looks: The Staff of the Elements is a long wooden staff, intricately carved with symbols representing the elements. It has a crystal orb at the top, which glows with a soft, pulsating light.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_magic: Allows the wielder to cast powerful elemental spells.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Inflicts additional elemental damage on spells and attacks.

name: Silver Longsword
description: A finely crafted longsword with a silver blade, perfect for slaying undead and supernatural creatures.
looks: The Silver Longsword has a slender blade made of polished silver. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with intricate silver engravings.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

special_effects.silver_enchantment: Deals additional damage to undead and supernatural creatures.

name: Mystic Staff
description: A staff imbued with powerful magical energy, capable of casting devastating spells.
looks: The Mystic Staff is a long wooden staff with intricate carvings and glowing magical crystals embedded at the top. It has a silver metal band around the middle, adorned with magical runes.

special_weapon_skills.mystic_magic: Allows the user to cast powerful spells using the Mystic Staff.

special_effects.spellpower: Increases the power of all spells cast while wielding the Mystic Staff.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade and a hilt wrapped in leather. The blade is plain, without any intricate designs.

special_weapon_skils.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when wielding this sword.

name: Crystal Staff
description: A majestic staff made from pure crystal, radiating with magical energy.
looks: The Crystal Staff is a tall and slender staff, crafted from a single clear crystal. It has intricate carvings along the shaft, depicting scenes of nature and magic. At the top of the staff is a large, faceted crystal that glows softly with a vibrant light.

special_effects.enhanced_spellcasting: Grants a bonus to Spellcasting skill when equipped.
